divs: sighting detailsduring a sightseeing trip touring the medellin metro, i saw this object that has no credible explanation. first i thought it was a toy, but to observe the height and shape of the object was not normal. had no visible cords or anything that would hold. also in the afternoon, while i was in a kind of cable car saw the object again in a different area from where the ufo look, unfortunately i could not record it because i could only see for a short time. i reported after this time because i had not report it to mufon interested in, but got the video on youtube and maybe will be helpful. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=18lwtvdjjno sorry, but my english is bad...
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Medellin
There were no other sightings in Medellin on or around December 8th 2006
